Title: Directs the state department of education to place a moratorium on the use of Test Assessing Secondary Completion (TASC) until certain requirements are met
Summary: Directs the state department of education to place a moratorium on the use of Test Assessing Secondary Completion (TASC) until certain requirements are met; relates to the high school equivalency account.
LawCode: Amd ยง97-hhh, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT directing the state department of education to place a moratorium on the use of Test Assessing Secondary Completion (TASC) until certain requirements are met; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to the high school equivalency account
